mean_cn: adj. 已放弃的；逆来顺受的
mean_en: feeling or showing acceptance that something unpleasant will happen or will not change
sentence: I guess I'm resigned to the fact that I'll never climb Mount Everest.
sentence_trans: 我想我已经接受了我永远也登不上珠穆朗玛峰的现实。
word_etyma: re回、向后 ＋ sign=mark，表示“记号，信号”" ＋ ed...的 → resign辞职 ＋ ed...的 → resigned顺从的；已辞职的
